props.name: col
props.description: Sets the column size for the cell to N

props.name: offset
props.description: Adds N columns of whitespace before the cell

props.name: align
props.description: Aligns the cell to the parent { 0: 'stretch',  1: 'top', 2: 'middle', 3: 'bottom' }

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the cell text and can contain HTML
